How Fusion Tech Just Changed Geothermal Energy Forever
items.author: Undecided with Matt Ferrell
items.summary:
- *Quaz* is using advanced fusion technology to revolutionize geothermal energy drilling. 
- Their innovative approach employs *millimeter wave technology* to vaporize rock, simplifying the drilling process and reducing costs. 
- With plans to achieve commercial energy production by *2028-2030*, Quaz aims to bring *abundant geothermal energy* to the grid on a global scale.

items.title: The Most Overlooked Clean Energy Source… Is Under Your Feet
items.author: Undecided with Matt Ferrell
items.summary:
- Barcelona's metro uses *regenerative braking* to reclaim kinetic energy and power **EV charging stations**.
- About *33% of train energy* is now sourced from this method, supporting multiple subway stations.
- Regenerative braking also helps reduce *temperatures* in the subway, making commutes more comfortable while cutting down on CO2 emissions.

items.title: Why Manure and Urine Could Power the Future
items.author: Undecided with Matt Ferrell
items.summary:
- *Cow manure* and *urine* can be transformed into valuable resources like biodegradable plastics and sustainable batteries.  
- Researchers are developing methods to create *nanocellulose fibers* from cow manure, reducing environmental impact compared to traditional processes.  
- Using *microbial processes*, urine can aid in constructing eco-friendly concrete, showcasing innovative uses for waste in promoting a *circular economy*.
